scripts.prepublishOnly: cp README.md packages/basebuilder/README.md && pnpm run build --filter='./packages/*' --parallel && cp packages/basebuilder/package.json packages/basebuilder/package.backup.json && cp packages/basebuilder-react/package.json packages/basebuilder-react/package.backup.json && json -I -f packages/basebuilder/package.json -e "this.devDependencies=undefined" && json -I -f packages/basebuilder-react/package.json -e "this.devDependencies=undefined"
scripts.postpublish: rm packages/basebuilder/README.md && mv packages/basebuilder/package.backup.json packages/basebuilder/package.json && mv packages/basebuilder-react/package.backup.json packages/basebuilder-react/package.json
